text: The 1941 Washington State Cougars football team was an American football team that represented Washington State College as a member of the Pacific Coast Conference (PCC) during the 1941 college football season. In their 16th season under head coach Babe Hollingbery, the team compiled a 6–4 record (5–3 in the PCC). ==Schedule== ==References== Washington State Category:Washington State Cougars football seasons Category:1941 in Washington (state)
title: 1941 Washington State Cougars football team
